name: Metaderby
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: "MetaDerby is the first free-to-play-and-earn horse racing metaverse on Avalanche where anyone can earn tokens through skilled gameplay and contribute to building the MetaDerby universe. Race, breed, trade NFT horses and bet on horse races to earn rewards."
